title: [WIKI][HGK]Candy Bar——条形糖果
author: HGK
txt_content:
本帖最后由 HGK 于 2014-7-17 21:33 编辑 

条形糖果是一种常见的食物，可以在许多区域找到，也是僵尸的罕见掉落物品。吃下可以恢复9％的饥饿度，可以大量收集用于远途旅行。多数在餐厅里找到。
条形糖果的图片：



原文：

Candy bars are a common source of food that can be found in many areas and are uncommonly dropped by Zombies. Eating a candy bar refills a 9% of hunger. Being quite common, it can be collected in large amounts and used for a journey to another location. It is mostly found in Diners.
最近也帮忙翻译wiki了呢
希望大家多支持~
